characterList: 選井亞惡角解嘴再稱講構扁篇編論輪

characters.story: A striking symbol for to choose that whispers "Shyuan" softly!
An striking symbol for a well that whispers "Jing" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The mouth takes the shape of asia, whispering "Yah" softly spoken through parted lips!
The heart takes the shape of evil, shouting "Uh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
See how the horn forms angle? It whispers "Jyao" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The knife takes the shape of to untie, whispering "Jyeh" softly!
The mouth takes the shape of orifice, whispering "Dzway" softly!
"Dzigh!" One more helmet commanded sharply - once more, again, next time!
A striking symbol for to weigh that sings "Chung!" cheerfully!
A striking symbol for to lecture that whispers "Jyahng" softly!
The tree takes the shape of to frame, shouting "Goh!" sharply!
The door stands for flat, whispering "Byan" softly - a vivid image to remember!
See how the bamboo forms piece of writing? It sings "Pyan!" cheerfully!
"Byan!" Flat threads sang cheerfully - time to compile, arrange, edit, knit a compilation!
A striking symbol for theory that shouts "Lwun!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for wheel that asks "Lwun? Revolve?" curiously!
